CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	CORROSION                        	CORSN                     
B            	METAL FATIGUE                    	FATGE                      
C            	SURFACE STRESS (RUNWAY)          	STRES                      
D            	OVERSTRESSED                     	OVSTR                      
E            	RUPTURED OR BURST                	BURST                     
F            	CRACKED, SPLIT, OR BROKEN        	CRACK                     
G            	FAULTY DESIGN                    	DESGN                      
H            	FAULTY PART (MANUFACTURE)        	MANUF                     
I            	IMPROPER INSTAL - NON STD PART   	INSTL                      
J            	IMPROPERLY SECURED               	SECUR                      
K            	JAMMED OR MALFUNCTION            	JAMML                     
L            	BOGUS                            	BOGUS                     
M            	FUEL CONTAMINATION               	FUELC                      
N            	OIL CONTAMINATION                	OILCN                     
O            	LACK OF LUBRICATION              	LUBRI                      
P            	FOREIGN OBJECT DAMAGE            	FOROB                      
Q            	ACCUMULATED MOSITURE/ICE         	MOICE                      
R            	CARBURETOR ICING                 	CRICE                      
S            	PLT INDUCED FAILURE/DEFIC FLT    	PILOT                      
T            	OTHER                            	OTHER                      
U            	UNDETERMINED                     	UNDET                     
V            	SUPPLEMENTAL RPT FORTHCOMMING    	SUPPL                      
W            	FOULED                           	FOULD                      
X            	WORN OUT-EXCEEDED TIME LIMITS    	TIRED                      
Y            	IMPROPER GRADE OF FUEL           	IGRFU                      
Z            	LEAKING                          	LEAKS                      
99999        	SUPPORT FACTOR INVALID           	ERROR MESSAGE
